source.sqlReaderQuery: select id,name from sysobjects where type='u' and id in (670625432,654625375,702625546)

activities.name: Copy Data From Excel to SQL

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		custid as string,
		cust_name as string,
		age as string,
		address as string,
		salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
Customers derive(cust_name = upper(cust_name)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CustomerMaster'],
	mapColumn(
		custid,
		cust_name,
		age,
		address,
		salary
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		custid as string,
		cust_name as string,
		age as string,
		address as string,
		salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
Customers filter(greaterOrEqual(toInteger(age), 25)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['FilteredCustomers'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		users as (userId as string, firstName as string, lastName as string, phoneNumber as string, emailAddress as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(users, users),
	mapColumn(
		UserID = users.userId,
		firstName = users.firstName,
		lastName = users.lastName,
		phoneNumber = users.phoneNumber,
		emailAddress = users.emailAddress
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UsersCSVData'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		custid as string,
		cust_name as string,
		age as string,
		address as string,
		salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> customers
source(output(
		oid as string,
		odate as string,
		custid as string,
		amount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> orders
customers, orders join(customers@custid == orders@custid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OrderDetailsReport'],
	mapColumn(
		custid = customers@custid,
		cust_name,
		age,
		address,
		salary,
		oid,
		odate,
		amount
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerDetails

parameters{
	DeptName as string
}
source(output(
		emp_id as short,
		emp_name as string,
		emp_gender as string,
		emp_salary as short,
		Dept as short,
		{Dept Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TotalEmployees
TotalEmployees filter({Dept Name}==$DeptName) ~> FilterByDept
FilterByDept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[('Employee' + $DeptName)],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> OverallEmployees
MapDrifted1 split(equals(Dept, '1'),
	equals(Dept, '2'),
	equals(Dept, '3'),
	equals(Dept, '4'),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ITEmployees, HREmployees, PRODEmployees, PURCHASEEmployees, Others)
OverallEmployees derive(emp_id = toString(byName('emp_id')),
		emp_name = toString(byName('emp_name')),
		emp_gender = toString(byName('emp_gender')),
		emp_salary = toString(byName('emp_salary')),
		Dept = toString(byName('Dept')),
		{Dept Name} = toString(byName('Dept Name'))) ~> MapDrifted1
ConditionalSplit1@ITEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['IT Employees'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@HREmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HR Employees'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@PRODEmployees sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PROD Employees'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3

sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['WranglingCustMaster'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink1
